column4: are you saying that when compiz is off you cant "slide" windows to the next virtual desktop?  That's normal.  Right click the title bar of the app and choose a workspace.
no no, I can put windows in the other workspaces fine but if I try to switch to them it doesn't shift over
that's absolutly normal.  Its been like that since day one.  You need to have compiz on for the effects.  Any animation si an effect, and is based on compiz's engine.
